reviews.review: BOTA O PORTAL ALI, EITA FIZ ERRADO. USEI MAIS MEU CEREBRO AQUI QUE NA ESCOLA.
烧脑门2是一部非常考验人智商的一款游戏，如果没有脑子脑你就不要入这款游戏吧233。总而言之，这是十分好的游戏。另外部分关卡还会有部分小彩蛋和一些和剧情有关的东西，希望大家游玩愉快!
游戏是好游戏，难度再高一点就好了。有很多小关卡完全就是糊弄的
Muy Bueno La Verdad

The game is really good, its a bit challenging
and that makes it fun....

somehow

It's portal 2
It's good.

there's nothing more to add

It's a bad game. Too many bad memes, not enough good puzzles. Seriously, every time valve wants to tell a story they do it with long, boring, and unskippable expository dialogue, this time the dialogue was particularly bad. Just a bunch of lame punchlines with no set-up strung end to end to deliver non-stop bad memes. First portal game had almost none of this and the story, atmosphere, and pacing was much better as a result. After playing through each game more times than I can count, it's really nice not having to listen to what any of the characters are saying and just solve the stupid puzzles, I can't do that in portal 2 though since they stop any progression until glados and wheatley have finished their lines.
Fuck valve
Nothings better than killing your friends in multiplayer
Great puzzle game with nice voice acting.
One of the best games I have ever played.

Like the original this game is also a masterpiece & will stand the test of time. [/h1]

Great story, even better co-op if you play it with the right person.
При помощи этой пушки, можно еБать мамок в другом городе, рекомендую!!!
Merece muchisimo la pena, tanto el modo historia como el cooperativo, y incluso si ya te has terminado los dos modos siempre te quedan los mapas de la comunidad.

Do grania w co-op mega opcja, chociaż już samo zagranie dla fabuły (polecam pierw 1 dla wprowadzenia) jest wystarczającym powodem do poświęcenia czasu na przejście gry. Często jest możliwość zakupu gry za okazyjną cenę, a do tego nie duże wymagania i dobra optymalizacja sprawia, że gra jest przyjemna. Czasem trzeba się wysilić, ale ma to swoje plusy :)

Plusy;
-Grafika,
-Poziomy,
-Warsztat,
-GlaDOS,
-Co-op,

Wady;
-Bez znajomych nie zagrasz coop,
-Ilość poziomów dostępnych w co-op domyślnie z czasem może się wydawać niewielka,
-Tylko dla osób cierpliwych i lubiących łamigłówki,
Oyun güzel , bende beyin yok.
Good story and fun to play with friends. Wish editor had a bit more things tho lol
Such an amazing game.  Wish my dreams would come true with a Portal 3.  C'mon Valve!

Игра Portal 2 на мой счет идеальная но требует усидчивости , она заставляет мозг человека работать !! Игра заключается в том что есть локации , в локациях определённой сложности логические задания. Хорошая игра для развития или для людей которые решили попробывать свой мозг в деле . А также у этой игры интересный сюжет , но если сюжет вам безразличен его можно пропустить. Игра не подходит тем людям которые кидают всё по среди дела если что то не получается , в принципе игра и рассчитана на то что с первой попытки человек её не пройдёт . Во время прохождения вы не плохо по ломаете Голову. Даю 5 балов за игру , спасибо разработчикам за эту головоломку =)
I love this AMAZING game! It's one of the BEST puzzle games!

British talking sphere.

10/10 would play again

The gameplay is great, challenging and not boring
Overall valve really nails the gameplay this time

The Graphics are the one that surprises me, built on an engine that is basically 13 years old by now, it nicely holds up with games that are more popular or Newer.
The post-proccesing and the dynamic real-time shadows really helps this old engine look better

However, those 2 factors are only the tip of the iceberg of this game

The story is interesting,streamlined and full of twists,once you play both Portal and Portal 2, you'll know exactly what i mean, 
[spoiler] The ending is the most emotional moment in this game, when chell leaves the base and returns to earth [/spoiler]

I just bought the Rainbow Six Siege complete eddition on uplay (were boycotting ubi for years) because these days ubisoft somewhat less greedy and intitled than valve corportation! What a crazy world we live in these days. 

Who would of guess that valve corporation will become that unethical micro-gambling piece of wasted human potential? Sure, money is good but video games always have been something more. It is a form of modern art.

At this stage valve corporation doesn't think that video games is a form of art but rather a form of business.

Art can't exist without sacrifice. And current valve employees are unwilling to sacrifice this cash cow in the name of art. 

Valve employees - don't you have enough millions stacked at this point?

Thing is, I got this on my first account (this one) and I cant share it with my new account, that wasnt VAC banned. It was a mistake how I got banned on this account, which is exactly why I made a new one, and I'm dead tired of having to switch accounts when I just want to play the game! I'm serious! I bought this game once, with my own money. Different accounts under the same email, shouldnt have to pay again, when you've already got it. It's stupid! I have the same email. Just, why cant I share this to my other account? I've done everythin' It's ridiculous. I just want to play Portal 2 without having to switch to an old, outdated, banned account. SO CAN YOU PLEASE REASON WITH YOUR DANG CUSTOMERS?
[h1]MAKE IT SHAREABLE[/h1]

세월이 흘러 세대가 교체되고, 내 육신이 이 땅에 존재하지 않을 미래에서도 여전히 '게임' 이라는 업종에서 두고두고 회자될 시리즈임에 분명하다. 혹시 모르겠다. 미래에 VR 기술이 더욱 진보하면, 실제로 포탈건을 쏘는 듯한 리얼리티를 느끼며 우리가 글라도스의 실험에 참여할 수도 있지 않을까? 아마 분명 그럴 것이다. 

다음은 내가 [b]《포탈2》[/b] 를 플레이하면서 든 생각 중 일부다.

• 감자는 터렛 보다 귀엽다
• 터렛의 귀여움이 전작에 비해 조금 덜한 느낌인데?
• 휘틀리, 이 새끼야. 아무리 그래도 응? 터렛을 꼭 이렇게 해야만··· 속이 후련했냐!
• 와 진짜 전작에 이어 엔딩곡 개미쳤다
• 오, 코옵 이거 엄청 재밌네!

나는 진짜 감자가 그렇게 귀여운 건 이 게임을 하면서 처음 알았다. 진심 감자 너무 귀여움. 원래 터렛빠였는데, 2편을 기회로 감자로 갈아탔다. 아직도 추락하면서 박수치는 감자가 머릿속에서 떠나질 않는다. 까마귀를 무서워하는 감자, 첼에게 농담을 던지는 감자, 휘틀리에게 질문하는 감자. 진짜 감자 최고다.

 지금 이 포탈이라는 게임을 미래의 후손들은 어떻게 기억하게 될까? 어쩌면, 시각과 청각적 요소만 느낄 수 있는 불완전한 기술력으로 만든, 딱히 플레이할 가치가 없는 퍼즐 게임 중 하나라고 생각할 지도 모른다. 하지만 누군가는 분명히 자식들에게 《포탈》 이라는 게임의 존재를 알려주며, 기회가 된다면 플레이도 해보게 할 것이다. 그렇게 포탈이라는 게임이 미래에 까지 계속 이어져 이 우주공간의 시간이 얼마나 흐른다 해도 꾸준히 회자되는 '명작 퍼즐 게임' 으로 남길 진심으로 바란다.

마지막으로, 삶에 이리저리 치여 게임을 할 시간도 없이 바쁜 나날을 보내고 있을 때, 어느 순간 무심코 포탈에 대한 자료를 보게 되었을 때, GLaDOS 는 여전히 웃으며 나에게 인사를 건넬 것이다. 옛날에 나에게 들려주었던 그 목소리로 말이다.

[b]Well here we are again. It's always such a pleasure.[/b]

Finished the story and i'm in tears. Beautiful graphics, amazing story and gameplay. After finishing the singleplayer story there is co-op and custom chambers (Some people have made a mini campaign too) to play. You can create your own chambers too!

Definitely worth playing!!

[h1]Details[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]Ghost in the Chell: a deeper, more immersive sequel to Portal. Dark, atmospheric, funny, rewarding.[/h1]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=961725455
Expanding the original Portal, this allows Chell to really get into the backstory and use even more science-guns and tricks to voercome the puzzles, traps, sentries and ultimately GlaDOS herself. Good luck, human!
[/quote]
[h1]Summary[/h1]
[quote]
[h1]A massive gaming milestone that everyone should experience - or else![/h1]
Pros:
- immersive fun, darkly funny
- more of Chell and her backstory
- the music throughout is amazing
- much more to do and game-options

Cons:
- no cake, no cool end-song
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1748253455

Overall, another freaking fantastic Portal game. I can only dream of Portal 3 now...

Portal 2? Als ich davon hörte dachte ich nur an die coolen Portal-Guns von denen man mir erzählte und war eigtl. sofort interessiert. Das setting sah schlicht und etwas futuristisch aus. Doch, dass das Spiel neben den abwechslungsreichen Levels und Puzzles auch noch Story bot...oh boy...das ist genau mein Ding. Etwas wie im Kino manchmal und langweilig wurde es auch nie. Außer ich kam mal aus mangel an Intellekt durch Übermüdung oder durch Logikfehlers meinerseits mal nicht voran und stand nur da...zumindest war ich da nicht komplett unterfordert oder habe mich nicht unterhalten gefühlt. De facto habe ich es genossen das bis zum Ende zu spielen und das mit purer Begeisterung und Erleichterung. Unter Zeitdruck kann ich echt keine Rätsel in einem Rutsch...Spannend, packend und es hat richtig Spaß gemacht. Sowas gönn ich mir gerne.
